name: All The Right Type Database File
summary: Learn about .V12 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: V12 files are commonly seen with the name data.v12 but they can also have other names based on student names or other identifiers. V12 files were introduced with version 3 of All The Right Type.

description: Database file used by All The Right Type, an educational program used to teach students keyboard typing skills; stores teacher and student performance records; enables teachers to track progress and create reports; generally handled in the background by the software and not manually opened or edited by the user.
